43426.name: Aluneth
43426.text: At the end of your turn, draw 3 cards.
43426.flavorText: PHENOMENAL ARCANE POWER…itty bitty living space.

45590.name: Arcane Artificer
45590.text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain Armor equal to its Cost.
45590.flavorText: Ethereal armor dissipates in 6 hours which can cause extreme awkwardness for first time buyers.

43483.name: Arcane Tyrant
43483.text: Costs (0) if you've cast a spell that costs (5) or more this turn.
43483.flavorText: Tyrant is such a strong word.

43304.name: Astral Tiger
43304.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a copy of this minion into your deck.
43304.flavorText: Astral kitty litter is surprisingly hard to find.

43282.name: Barkskin
43282.text: Give a minion +3 Health. Gain 3 Armor.
43282.flavorText: Make like a tree… and gain armor.

46258.name: Benevolent Djinn
46258.text: At the end of your turn, restore 3 Health to your hero.
46258.flavorText: Wish 1: funnel cakes. Wish 2: funnel cakes. Wish 3: FUNNEL CAKES.

43277.name: Bladed Gauntlet
43277.text: Has Attack equal to your Armor. Can't attack heroes.

43523.name: Boisterous Bard
43523.flavorText: As a kid, she fought with rocks. Now she fights with ROCK!

43294.name: Branching Paths
43294.text: Choose Twice - Draw a card; Give your minions +1 Attack; Gain 6 Armor.
43294.flavorText: Three paths diverged in a darkened hall, and I – I took the one less traveled by, And got eaten by a slime.

43384.name: Call to Arms
43384.flavorText: More personal than a text to arms.

45537.name: Candleshot
45537.flavorText: Once called Cahn’delar, Shortbow of the Ancient Whisker.

45195.name: Carnivorous Cube
45195.text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion. Deathrattle: Summon 2 copies of it.
45195.flavorText: He's always grumpy until he's eaten his first barista of the morning.

46286.name: Cataclysm
46286.flavorText: RUN FROM SKY CANDLES! THEY BURN! RUN!

43358.name: Cave Hydra
43358.text: Also damages the minions next to whomever this attacks.
43358.flavorText: Can be upgraded into a Cave Lurker.

43237.name: Cavern Shinyfinder
43237.text: Battlecry: Draw a weapon from your deck.
43237.flavorText: They call her the candled vandal.

45520.name: Cheat Death
45520.text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to your hand. It costs (2) less.

43515.name: Corridor Creeper
43515.text: Costs (1) less whenever a minion dies while this is in your hand.
43515.flavorText: It likes the smell of dead things, which is curious, as it has no visible nose.

43469.name: Corrosive Sludge
43469.flavorText: The result of centuries of terrible sanitation.

43322.name: Crushing Hand
43322.flavorText: Shamans always have the firmest handshakes.

46450.name: Crushing Walls
46450.text: Destroy your opponent's left and right-most minions.

45833.name: Crystal Lion
45833.text: Divine Shield Costs (1) less for each Silver Hand Recruit you control.
45833.flavorText: Standard issue recruit gear: 1 silver sword, 1 Lordaeron insignia, 2 bags of crystal kibble.

45594.name: Cursed Disciple
45594.flavorText: Politer than his brother, the cursing disciple, but far more evil.

43128.name: Dark Pact
43128.text: Destroy a friendly minion. Restore 8 Health to your hero.
43128.flavorText: "Don't worry about the fine print. Just sign here."

43424.name: Deck of Wonders
43424.text: Shuffle 5 Scrolls into your deck. When drawn, cast a random spell.
43424.flavorText: "Pick a card, any card. Wait! No! Not that one!" - Last words of previous owner

45707.name: Dire Mole
45707.flavorText: You especially don't want to make a dire mountain out of a dire mole hill.

45528.name: Dragon Soul
45528.text: After you cast 3 spells in a turn, summon a 5/5 Dragon.
45528.flavorText: Crafted by Deathwing's goblin horde, but the dragon added the rainbow sparkles himself.

45271.name: Dragon's Fury
45271.text: Reveal a spell from your deck. Deal damage equal to its Cost to all minions.
45271.flavorText: “C’mon Hucklemuck. She’ll never notice if we take just one little coin.”

46499.name: Dragoncaller Alanna
46499.text: Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Dragon for each spell you cast this game that costs (5) or more.
46499.flavorText: Her secret is using a gentle voice and carrying a baggie of hotdogs.

46557.name: Dragonhatcher
46557.text: At the end of your turn, Recruit a Dragon.
46557.flavorText: Which came first? The dragon or the dragonhatcher?

43486.name: Dragonslayer
43486.flavorText: A pair of stout dwarves nearly averted the Cataclysm.

46007.name: Drygulch Jailor
46007.text: Deathrattle: Add 3 Silver Hand Recruits to your hand.

46031.name: Drywhisker Armorer
46031.text: Battlecry: For each enemy minion, gain 2 Armor.
46031.flavorText: Kobolds use anything for armor: Pots, pans, garbage cans… even other kobolds.

45899.name: Duskbreaker
45899.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all other minions.
45899.flavorText: Waking up at the break of dusk is just not as impressive.

43465.name: Ebon Dragonsmith
43465.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of a random weapon in your hand by (2).
43465.flavorText: Having a furnace-mouth is really handy for a blacksmith.

45531.name: Elven Minstrel
45531.flavorText: "After that gig in Hamlin went south, I swore off rats."

45535.name: Evasion
45535.text: Secret: After your hero takes damage, become Immune this turn.
45535.flavorText: Works on weapons, missiles, and taxes.

43407.name: Explosive Runes
43407.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, deal 6 damage to it and any excess to their hero.
43407.flavorText: Sometimes it's safer NOT to read the warning signs.

43228.name: Fal'dorei Strider
43228.text: Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Ambushes into your deck. When drawn, summon a 4/4 Spider.
43228.flavorText: What’s worse? Seeing the spider, or NOT seeing the spider, but knowing it’s somewhere in your deck?

45547.name: Feral Gibberer
45547.text: After this minion attacks a hero, add a copy of it to your hand.

43357.name: Flanking Strike
43357.text: Deal 3 damage to a minion. Summon a 3/3 Wolf.
43357.flavorText: Wolves to the left and arrows to the right, here I am stuck in the middle with you.

46087.name: Fungal Enchanter
46087.text: Battlecry: Restore 2 Health to all friendly characters.

45265.name: Fungalmancer
45265.flavorText: Fungalmancy is the easy major for those who can't cut it at Waxmancy.

43517.name: Furbolg Mossbinder
43517.text: Battlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a 6/6 Elemental.
43517.flavorText: Behold, the unstoppable power of MOSS!

46058.name: Gather Your Party
46058.flavorText: Thrilling adventure! Danger guaranteed! Loot uncertain! Death optional! Who’s with me?

46027.name: Gemstudded Golem
46027.text: Taunt Can only attack if you have 5 or more Armor.

46442.name: Geosculptor Yip
46442.text: At the end of your turn, summon a random minion with Cost equal to your Armor (up to 10).
46442.flavorText: Once crafted a gauntlet out of earwax and pure ambition.

46495.name: Gilded Gargoyle
46495.text: Deathrattle: Add a Coin to your hand.
46495.flavorText: You hear a coin rattling inside the slotted gargoyle...What could it mean?

46032.name: Grand Archivist
46032.text: At the end of your turn, cast a spell from your deck (targets chosen randomly).

43528.name: Gravelsnout Knight
43528.text: Battlecry: Summon a random 1-Cost minion for your opponent.
43528.flavorText: The mole of La Mancha rides again!

45945.name: Greedy Sprite
45945.flavorText: Sparkliest of the seven deadly sprites.

43485.name: Green Jelly
43485.text: At the end of your turn, summon a 1/2 Ooze with Taunt.
43485.flavorText: This card really breaks out of the mold.

45995.name: Grumble, Worldshaker
45995.text: Battlecry: Return your other minions to your hand. They cost (1).
45995.flavorText: The grumbling grew to a mighty rumbling, and out of the caverns the kobolds came tumbling.

46069.name: Guild Recruiter
46069.text: Battlecry: Recruit a minion that costs (4) or less.

46067.name: Healing Rain
46067.text: Restore 12 Health randomly split among all friendly characters.

43507.name: Hoarding Dragon
43507.flavorText: Keeps his two cents to himself.

43133.name: Hooked Reaver
43133.text: Battlecry: If you have 15 or less Health, gain +3/+3 and Taunt.
43133.flavorText: The hook is just an accessory. He can reave just fine without it.

46082.name: Hungry Ettin
46082.text: Taunt Battlecry: Summon a random 2-Cost minion for your opponent.
46082.flavorText: How can he be hungry… if he's Ettin!?

43284.name: Ironwood Golem
43284.text: Taunt Can only attack if you have 3 or more Armor.

45859.name: Ixlid, Fungal Lord
45859.text: After you play a minion, summon a copy of it.
45859.flavorText: We suggest crafting Ixlid; he'll grow on you. Literally.

46390.name: Kathrena Winterwisp
46390.flavorText: She’s not one of those treehugger elves – but she does like the occasional cuddle.

46589.name: King Togwaggle
46589.text: Battlecry: Swap decks with your opponent. Give them a Ransom spell to swap back.
46589.flavorText: Management of the Kobold Empire requires a careful balance between a lack of social services and fiscal irresponsibility.

47035.name: Kingsbane
47035.text: Always keeps enchantments. Deathrattle: Shuffle this into your deck.
47035.flavorText: But it has a soft spot for emperors.

45929.name: Kobold Apprentice
45929.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage randomly split among all enemies.
45929.flavorText: Horrible secret: The Darkness is immune to Arcane Missiles.

43269.name: Kobold Barbarian
43269.text: At the start of your turn, attack a random enemy.
43269.flavorText: What is best in life? To make candle. To keep candle. To hear lamentations of candle-takers.

43329.name: Kobold Hermit
43329.text: Battlecry: Choose a basic Totem. Summon it.
43329.flavorText: To truly understand candles, it takes YEARS of quiet contemplation.

45936.name: Kobold Illusionist
45936.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 copy of a minion from your hand.
45936.flavorText: He can make ANYTHING look like a candle.

43122.name: Kobold Librarian
43122.text: Battlecry: Draw a card. Deal 2 damage to your hero.
43122.flavorText: Kobolds sort books using a gooey decimal system.

43272.name: Lesser Amethyst Spellstone
43272.text: Lifesteal. Deal 3 damage to a minion. (Take damage from your cards to upgrade.)
43272.flavorText: A purple stone Azari carved For dark hearts, craving, power-starved. The first to bow, the warlock Rin, Embraced the darkness, slew her kin.

46307.name: Lesser Diamond Spellstone
46307.text: Resurrect 2 different friendly minions. (Cast 4 spells to upgrade.)
46307.flavorText: A diamond, white, this stone the eighth A precious jewel for those of faith A whispered prayer restores the lost But none among them know the cost.

43363.name: Lesser Emerald Spellstone
43363.text: Summon two 3/3 Wolves. (Play a Secret to upgrade.)
43363.flavorText: An emerald stone for Tauren hands Who sought its strength to save their lands Their tribes now lost, their rage released Who’s hunting now? And who’s the beast?

43288.name: Lesser Jasper Spellstone
43288.text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. (Gain 3 Armor to upgrade.)
43288.flavorText: In ancient woods, elves fought the curse The demon’s shadow to disperse But hatred raged and frail souls turned Now horned and hooved their forests burned.

45519.name: Lesser Mithril Spellstone
45519.text: Summon one 5/5 Mithril Golem. (Equip a weapon to upgrade.)
45519.flavorText: To dwarves of stone the demon called With promises of might, enthralled In grasping greed they found their doom Forever bound in mithril tombs.

46296.name: Lesser Onyx Spellstone
46296.text: Destroy 1 random enemy minion. (Play 3 Deathrattle cards to upgrade.)
46296.flavorText: The trolls of old embraced the gift A jewel of black for daggers swift No party lasts who finds the stone Those wielding it soon stand alone.

43382.name: Lesser Pearl Spellstone
43382.text: Summon a 2/2 Spirit with Taunt. (Restore 3 Health to upgrade.)
43382.flavorText: In ages old, when Ancients broke Azari of the Legion spoke To tempt the mortals: gems of power The weak succumbed, their souls devoured.

43414.name: Lesser Ruby Spellstone
43414.text: Add 1 random Mage spell to your hand. (Play 2 Elementals to upgrade.)
43414.flavorText: The final stone undid its master Spun into wards by nameless caster Azari wailed a savage roar Now sealed in nether, evermore.

43331.name: Lesser Sapphire Spellstone
43331.text: Summon 1 copy of a friendly minion. (Overload 3 Mana Crystals to upgrade.)
43331.flavorText: A stone of blue, embraced with glee By murloc lords beneath the sea Soon numberless they swarmed the shore First two, then four, then more...and more...

45877.name: Level Up!
45877.text: Give your Silver Hand Recruits +2/+2 and Taunt.

46541.name: Leyline Manipulator
46541.text: Battlecry: If you're holding any cards that didn't start in your deck, reduce their Cost by (2).
46541.flavorText: The shortest distance between two points is a leyline.

43473.name: Lone Champion
43473.text: Battlecry: If you control no other minions, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
43473.flavorText: He is a champion, with no friends. He'll keep on fighting, til the end!

45539.name: Lynessa Sunsorrow
45539.text: Battlecry: Cast each spell you cast on your minions this game on this one.
45539.flavorText: A diet of pure magic is great for the complexion but wreaks havoc on one's mood.

45988.name: Marin the Fox
45988.text: Battlecry: Summon a 0/8 Treasure Chest for your opponent. (Break it for awesome loot!)
45988.flavorText: My name is Marin the Fox. You took my treasure. Prepare to die.

46449.name: Master Oakheart
46449.flavorText: His adventuring party consists of Goldshire Footman, Frostwolf Grunt and Hadronox.

46432.name: Murmuring Elemental
46432.text: Battlecry: Your next Battlecry this turn triggers twice.

45828.name: Oaken Summons
45828.text: Gain 6 Armor. Summon a minion from your deck that costs (4) or less.
45828.flavorText: The Guild used oak trees until they all turned to ash.

45930.name: Plated Beetle
45930.flavorText: "Ok, your party has defeated the beetle." "I put it on my head." "What?" "I put it on my head. Like a hat."

45820.name: Possessed Lackey
45820.flavorText: If you don't keep up with your payments, it'll be a repossessed lackey.

43373.name: Potion of Heroism
43373.text: Give a minion Divine Shield. Draw a card.

45905.name: Primal Talismans
45905.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a random basic Totem."
45905.flavorText: All that remained from the first kobold colony: a single talisman and the word "Flamestrike."

45979.name: Psionic Probe
45979.text: Copy a spell in your opponent's deck and add it to your hand.

43112.name: Psychic Scream
43112.text: Shuffle all minions into your opponent's deck.

45269.name: Raven Familiar
45269.text: Battlecry: Reveal a spell in each deck. If yours costs more, draw it.
45269.flavorText: Quoth the raven, 'Does yours cost more?'

46026.name: Reckless Flurry
46026.text: Spend all your Armor. Deal that much damage to all minions.
46026.flavorText: Look. Cautious Flurries will only get you so far in life.

43369.name: Rhok'delar
43369.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no minions, fill your hand with Hunter spells.

46040.name: Rin, the First Disciple
46040.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Add 'The First Seal' to your hand.
46040.flavorText: Signed and sealed, she delivers oblivion.

46088.name: Rummaging Kobold
46088.text: Battlecry: Return one of your destroyed weapons to your hand.
46088.flavorText: "Broken longsword is brand new shortsword." - Kobold Proverb

43453.name: Scorp-o-matic
43453.text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion with 1 or less Attack.
43453.flavorText: Back in my day, we had to manually scorp.

46445.name: Seeping Oozeling
46445.text: Battlecry: Gain the Deathrattle of a random minion in your deck.
46445.flavorText: Uh, you might want to get that looked at.

43345.name: Sewer Crawler
43345.flavorText: His clothing is "ratty" in more ways than one.

43420.name: Shifting Scroll
43420.text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a random Mage spell.
43420.flavorText: Next turn, this is going to be AMAZING.

46892.name: Shimmering Courser
46892.flavorText: A courser is a courser of course, of course, she's more of a unicorn than a horse...

46118.name: Shrieking Shroom
46118.text: At the end of your turn, summon a random 1-Cost minion.
46118.flavorText: Auditioning for the next Fungal Idol.

45287.name: Silver Vanguard
45287.flavorText: Float like a Faerie Dragon, sting like a Hivequeen.

46299.name: Skull of the Man'ari
46299.text: At the start of your turn, summon a Demon from your hand.

43494.name: Sleepy Dragon
43494.flavorText: Local villagers call her "Naps Under the Mountain."

43493.name: Sneaky Devil
43493.flavorText: The result of a tragic accident involving a Defias Thug, a Wand of Polymorph, and a bundle of Fel Lotus.

45263.name: Sonya Shadowdancer
45263.text: After a friendly minion dies, add a 1/1 copy of it to your hand. It costs (1).
45263.flavorText: Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like a 1/1 is watching.

46551.name: Spiteful Summoner
46551.text: Battlecry: Reveal a spell from your deck. Summon a random minion with the same Cost.
46551.flavorText: Sometimes she'll summon a Doomsayer. Out of spite.

43474.name: Stoneskin Basilisk
43474.flavorText: He got that way from looking into a mirror.

45529.name: Sudden Betrayal
45529.text: Secret: When a minion attacks your hero, instead it attacks one of its neighbors.
45529.flavorText: You thought he was your bro-bold, but turns out he's your foe-bold.

46544.name: Temporus
46544.text: Battlecry: Your opponent takes two turns. Then you take two turns.
46544.flavorText: Follows adventurers, seeking the ultimate time magic: the ability to reload.

46454.name: The Darkness
46454.text: Starts Dormant. Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Candles into the enemy deck. When drawn, this awakens.
46454.flavorText: I would rather light a single candle than curse the darkness. But I'm willing to do both.

46305.name: The Runespear
46305.text: After your hero attacks, Discover a spell and cast it with random targets.
46305.flavorText: When asked what the runes do, the tauren smith smiled: "A little of this, a little of that..."

45546.name: To My Side!
45546.text: Summon an Animal Companion, or 2 if your deck has no minions.
45546.flavorText: I hunt alone. Well, me and Misha. And Huffer. And Leokk.

43489.name: Toothy Chest
43489.text: At the start of your turn, set this minion's Attack to 4.
43489.flavorText: Do you want to eat an adventurer? I want to eat an adventurer!

45837.name: Trogg Gloomeater
45837.flavorText: His breath smells like agony and despair, which is still better than most troggs.

46107.name: Twig of the World Tree
46107.flavorText: For druids who want to branch out.

46460.name: Twilight Acolyte
46460.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, swap this minion's Attack with another minion's.
46460.flavorText: The dragons mostly keep him around as a snack.

45353.name: Twilight's Call
45353.text: Summon 1/1 copies of 2 friendly Deathrattle minions that died this game.
45353.flavorText: If you’re experiencing resurrection sickness, press 1.

45759.name: Unidentified Elixir
45759.text: Give a minion +2/+2. Gains a bonus effect in your hand.
45759.flavorText: "Here, taste this." (Slurp) "What is it?" "I don't know, I found it in one of the labs."

45782.name: Unidentified Maul
45782.text: Gains a bonus effect in your hand.
45782.flavorText: When all you have is an unidentified maul, everything else looks like an unidentified nail.

45775.name: Unidentified Shield
45775.text: Gain 5 Armor. Gains a bonus effect in your hand.
45775.flavorText: The kobold stared at the bundle for a long time. “Ah hah!” he said. “It’s a shield.”

46303.name: Unstable Evolution
46303.text: Echo Transform a friendly minion into one that costs (1) more.

46263.name: Val'anyr
46263.text: Deathrattle: Give a minion in your hand +4/+2. When it dies, reequip this.
46263.flavorText: Recently unearthed in one of the deepest kobold caves. Traded for a large candle.

43526.name: Violet Wurm
43526.flavorText: It's wurms all the way down.

46461.name: Void Ripper
46461.text: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of all other minions.
46461.flavorText: You had to put the portable hole inside the bag of holding, didn't you?!

46056.name: Voidlord
46056.flavorText: Never let it hold your checkbook.

43121.name: Vulgar Homunculus
43121.flavorText: Fortunately he has an even number of fingers.

43359.name: Wandering Monster
43359.text: Secret: When an enemy attacks your hero, summon a 3-Cost minion as the new target.
43359.flavorText: Not all who wander are lost. This one is lost though, for sure.

43463.name: Wax Elemental
43463.flavorText: Takes double damage from wick-based weapons.

46440.name: Windshear Stormcaller
46440.text: Battlecry: If you control all 4 basic Totems, summon Al'Akir the Windlord.
46440.flavorText: Don't ever doubt Al'Akir's love for basic totems.

46077.name: Woecleaver
46077.text: After your hero attacks, Recruit a minion.
46077.flavorText: Turn that frown into TWO frowns!

46403.name: Zola the Gorgon
46403.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a Golden copy of it to your hand.
46403.flavorText: Her name seems a bit cheesy.
